elements.name: test the login functionality of amazon

steps.name: user on chrome browser
user enters the url of amazon
hits enters on chrome browser
user should see the sign in page of amazon
user mouseover on hello sign-in button on amazon
clicks on sign-n button of amazon
user should see enter email or phonenum textbox of amazon
user enters the email of amazon
clicks on continue button of amazon
user should see the password textbox of amazon
user enters the password in password textbox
clicks on keep me signed-in
clicks on sign-button of amazon
user should see the homepage of amazon
user types shoes for men in search textbox
hits on search icon
user should see search results
user clicks on adidas  Mens Grand Court Sneaker
user should see the select size dropdown
